help.desc: Used to get this help message.

info.desc: Used to get info about the bot.

oldest.desc: Used to get a list of the oldest users on this guild.

prefix.desc: Used to either get or set the guild's prefix.

set.desc: Sets guild's prefix to the one specified.

language.desc: Used to either get or set the guild's language.

set.desc: Sets guild's language to the one specified.

purge.desc: Deletes the specified ammount of messages.

music.desc: Used to manage bot's music features.

play.desc: Plays the specified link/id/searched youtube video.

disconnect.desc: Disconnects from the current voice channel.

list.desc: Lists all tracks on the queue.

now.desc: Replies with the name of the currently playing track.

sendembed.desc: Sends an embed message to a channel using the specified JSON config.
sendembed.longDesc: Sends an embed message to a channel using the specified JSON config, an example of JSON config can be found at the bot's GitHub Repo.

oldest.title: Oldest Users:
oldest.desc: A list of the oldest users on this guild.
oldest.error: There was an error while trying to retrieve information about all members on this guild.

set.mustSpecify: You must specify a prefix to change it

set.same: "{0}" is the same language as the current one, no need to change.
set.mustSpecify: You must specify a language to change it

purge.outOfRange: Only {0} Messages can be delete at once.
purge.onlyPositive: Can't delete a negative ammount of messages.

shortcuts.on: Shortcuts can now be used on your guild!
shortcuts.off: Shortcuts were disabled from your guild.

play.author: Author: {0}
play.tooLong: Video is too long, it can't be more than {0} minutes long.
play.notSameChannel: You must be in the same voice channel as mine to use this command.
play.notConnected: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command.
play.notJoinable: Couldn't join your voice channel, please use one that I can join.
play.error:
There was an error while trying to retrieve information about the video you specified.
<{0}>

skip.notConnected: I must be playing music for you to perform this command.

join.emptyQueue: Can't join if the queue is empty.
join.alreadyConnected: I'm already on a voice channel.
join.notConnected: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command.
join.notJoinable: Couldn't join your voice channel, please use one that I can join.

disconnect.notSameChannel: You must be in the same voice channel as mine to use this command.
disconnect.notConnected: I must be in a voice channel for you to perform this command.

loop.looping: The queue is now in loop!

list.title: {0}'s queue:
list.error: There was an error while trying to retrieve information about this video.

now.nothing: I'm not playing anything at the moment.
now.error:
There was an error while trying to retrieve information about the currently playing video.

sendembed.noChannel: You must specify a text channel.
sendembed.invalidChannel: The channel you specified is invalid.
sendembed.noTextChannel: The specified channel must be a text one.
sendembed.noSendPremission: You don't have permissions to send messages to the specified channel.
sendembed.invalidJSON: The JSON string you've sent is invalid, please fix it and try again.
